HomePage.decription: Practice with a variety of writing prompts for the TOEFL, TOEIC, and GRE. Submit an essay and receive an AI-generated score along with detailed, personalized feedback on grammar, logic, structure, and more.

feature1.title: AI-based Evaluation
feature1.description: Latest AI technology for accurate and objective essay evaluation

feature2.title: Fast Feedback
feature2.description: Detailed evaluation results and improvement points in minutes

feature3.title: Detailed Analysis
feature3.description: Comprehensive evaluation in grammar, structure, and logic

service.descript1: These Terms and Conditions aim to define the terms of use and procedures for services provided by SaveMyEssay (hereinafter referred to as the "Company"), as well as the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between the Company and its members.
service.descript2: The definitions of terms used in these Terms and Conditions are as follows:
service.li1: "Service" refers to all services provided by the Company.
service.li2: "Member" refers to an individual who has entered into a service use agreement with the Company.
service.li3: "User" refers to a member who uses the Company's services.
